plot: A performance of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony, in commemoration of the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989. The word "Joy" in the "Ode to Joy" (sung in German), has been replaced by "Freedom".
title: Bernstein: Ode to Freedom
plot_es: A performance of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony, in commemoration of the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989. The word "Joy" in the "Ode to Joy" (sung in German), has been replaced by "Freedom".
plot_en: A performance of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony, in commemoration of the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989. The word "Joy" in the "Ode to Joy" (sung in German), has been replaced by "Freedom".
